definition: to go the wrong way/to go against one-way traffic regulation
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
to go against the tide (idiom); to do things all wrong/to try to turn back history/a perverse way of doing things

sentences.english: Ok, having discussed Mercury retrograde, now let's go on to other things.
sentences.chinese: 好了，说完水星逆行，我们现在继续磋议其他的。

sentences.english: Venus rarely goes out of phase, but fortunately, this will only be retrograde for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 金星很少异相，不过幸运的是，这次逆行只有六周。

sentences.english: Mercury is still retrograding so you may run into some delays.
sentences.chinese: 但水星仍然在逆行，因此你可能会遭遇延误。

sentences.english: Venus will turn Retrograde in Scorpio, putting a strong focus on sexuality and intimate relationships.
sentences.chinese: 金星会在天蝎座逆行转，强烈关注性和亲密关系。

sentences.english: On retrograde pyelography the catheter is curved as"S"shape.
sentences.chinese: 逆行肾盂造影时输尿管导管弯曲，呈“S”形。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the repair of forefoot cutaneous defect with retrograde foot vascularized flap.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨足逆行血管蒂皮瓣修复前足皮肤缺损的效果。

sentences.english: When an artist deserts to the side of the angels it is the most odious of treasons.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家投合传统派的观点，便是最可恶的叛逆行为。

sentences.english: You may be able to get paid before Mercury retrogrades.
sentences.chinese: 这样就可能在水星逆行之前要回欠债。

sentences.english: Thankfully, Venus only retrogrades for a few weeks every two years.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，几个星期只每两年金星逆行。

sentences.english: You never want to schedule anything too close to the day a planet turns retrograde or even on the days when it turns direct.
sentences.chinese: 你千万不要在一个行星正行或逆行的那天做什么计划。

sentences.english: Prograde orbits are more vulnerable than retrograde ones.
sentences.chinese: 因此顺行的轨道会比逆行轨道更加脆弱。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a novel suturing method in valve replacement.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍一种心脏瓣膜手术的逆行缝合方法。

sentences.english: Bile duct stones can be diagnosed and removed with an ERCP.
sentences.chinese: 内镜逆行胰胆管造影可以诊断并清除胆管结石。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate results of the treatment of distal femoral fracture with retrograde interlocking intramedullary nail.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价逆行交锁髓内钉治疗股骨远端骨折的疗效。

sentences.english: Wait for Mercury to stop retrograding.
Ah, it's part of the Mercury retrograde process.
sentences.chinese: 啊，这是水星逆行的一部份影响。

definition: circular motion in the same sense as the sun/clockwise
to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
to exceed the speed limit/to speed/high-speed
backwards/reverse direction
to pass by/menstruation
to change lanes
to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
to turn/to go around a corner
one-way road
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
to change buses, trains etc
to reverse (a vehicle)/to drive backwards
to cross (a street)
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
to break the rules/to violate regulations
to turn one's head/to turn round/to turn about
